title: Radio Group
description: A set of checkable buttons—known as radio buttons—where no more than one of the buttons can be checked at a time.

body.raw:
## Installation 1. Install the `@radix-ui/react-radio-group` component from radix-ui: ```bash npm install @radix-ui/react-radio-group ``` 2. Copy and paste the following code into your project. This is the `` primitive. You can place it in a file at `components/ui/radio-group.tsx`. ## Usage ```tsx import { Label } from "@/components/ui/label" import { RadioGroup, RadioGroupItem } from "@/components/ui/radio-group" ``` ```tsx
```
